attributes.action: Cease and disband the IWF for lack of oversight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Internet Watch Foundation are an independent, self-regulating body that produces a blacklist of website content, that several ISPs implement.

This body has no oversight, no mandate, and blacklists websites in secret and raises serious free speech and censorship issues.

rejection.details: The IWF is an independent body and it is therefore outside the remit of government to "cease or disband" it.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
